column3: Latest;Preah Vihear: Local officials have closed two dentists in Preah Vihear province:------Health officials and health officials in Preah Vihear province closed two dentists after finding they had no legal provisions------31-year-old Seang Meng Leung
column8: located in the village of Taungup.------Meanwhile
column9: officials also found out-of-date medicines. The director of Srayang Health Center
column11: has advised all unlicensed medical practitioners to cease  treatment activities and required these two locations to be closed until they have permits from the relevant ministries to continue the business.
